nodes.text: A mansion served as the home of Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Bane and his apprentice, Darth Zannah, following their escape from the Jedi on Ambria in 990 BBY. In 980 BBY, Princess Serra hired the Iktotchi assassin Huntress and a group of mercenaries to capture Bane, as she believed he had killed her father. They arrived at Bane's mansion while he was returning from a mission to Prakith, ambushed him upon his return, and brought him to Serra.
